item.title: Choosing your .NET Core Version CLI
item.author: info@nandotech.com (Fernando Rodriguez)
item.description: I recently downloaded and upgraded to .NET Core 1.1.0 which comes along with updated CLI tools, 1.0.0-preview3-004056. This new version reflects the CLI tools that are being used for the new .csproj project system which does away with project.json that many of us grew to know and love. Of course, this has been a long time coming and the announcement that Microsoft would be moving back to .csproj was announced way back in March or so.
